title: Ok Shitpost aside, I think regardless whether you agree with him or not, you should see this

embed.description: This is beyond the pale of insanity at this point. We need to be together.

body:
Obviously, I dont think that RossBoomsocks is that great in terms of his league content (still a better brofresco) but this video needs to be seen.

Even if you disagree, just upvote so others can see it too,

I never want anything like this to happen in the League scene

replies.body: Can you TLDR the video please? Would be awesome, thanks
I have work i need to do right now but I'll be willing to write one, but it would most likely have to be after this video has been glossed over.
Very serious, an important issue. Did anybody catch the name of the media outlet that was smearing the youtuber he was talking about?
IÂ´ma double check first but I think he had an interview with the Daily Mail, but looking for the article would be the best idea

He is correct and we should certainly talk about these issues.  Also that video takedown showing the weakness of the vest is obviously bullshit, that man should be praised for finding defective equipment and making it public. This video was made before the latest incident but it covers the whole thing as well so I'd check it out.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SUr8cLO2vzQ
